Message:
When we started our journey
and dispelled the Curse of flowers,
I felt something strange inside me.

The moment the entire Curse was
dispelled from the country of Fran,
I realized what had happened.

The Curse wasn’t dispelled.
It was only sealed away
inside of me.

After every Curse
has converged into me,
I’m sure that in the end, I’ll...

There are 10 Curses
destroying the world,
and it’s impossible for
them all to be sealed away
inside a single person.

But, there’s one secret
I’ve been hiding.

When I was a child,
I was called the child of miracles.

Everyone said I was born
with the power of God,
capable of performing
His miracle only once.

But, knowing that my life
can save the world provided
me with a little bit of solace.

That’s why, it wasn’t dying
that I was afraid of—

it was the idea of dying
without being able to
use this power.
